Explanation_8:
You  wrote review  review text: "Love this, leaves hair soft and manageable. i have short hair so a small amount works great for me." for item "Sally Hershberger Shagg Style Primer-6.7oz" (with categories "Beauty"),

which is similar to  review text: "My fine hair is thinning (age!!) and this brush provides just the "lift" and wave my hair needs to add volume and somewhat disguise the thinning. Sometimes I do have to be careful with it tangling in the hair, even when I use the release button, but with care it can be untangled without damaging hair. It has just about totally replaced my hair dryer. (I usually let my hair air-dry for 15-20 minutes before using the brush, if I have the time. That cuts down on the amount of heat I have to use on my hair.)" for item "Vidal Sasson VS433C Tangle-Free Hot Air Brush Styler and Dryer" (with categories "Beauty"),

which is the review of  "Vidal Sasson VS433C Tangle-Free Hot Air Brush Styler and Dryer" (with categories "Beauty")
Explanation_9:
You  wrote review  review text: "I'm glad I bought this litter box. It is so simple and I can say that it's kind of \\"fun\\" cleaning the litter box now, and my cats are happier because it gets cleaned everyday now. It works great and is perfect for my two cats. I have a giant cat and he is able to fit in the box fine without making a huge mess." for item "Roll n Clean Self Cleaning Litter Box" (with categories "Pet Products"),

which is similar to  review text: "I have to say this is one of the best products we have ever bought for our cats. They love the fact that every time they get in the litter it's clean, and with everyone in household being out at least 12 hours a day week days, it save us coming home to the horrible job of scooping poop. Do I think the replacement recepticles are over priced, yes, but are they worth the investment, also yes. We love our cats, and now we love them more because we are not dreading coming home to a full cat litter tray. This product is also highly useful for those people that have neighbours come and look after there cats while you are away. Our Neighbour loved the fact that she didn't have scoop out the cat poop! While I think this can be a little pricey, it is well worth the investment." for item "LitterMaid LM900 Mega Self-Cleaning Litter Box" (with categories "Pet Products"),

which is the review of  "LitterMaid LM900 Mega Self-Cleaning Litter Box" (with categories "Pet Products")

Explanation_12:
You  wrote review  review text: "The events in this book were good. But this book was a bit aggravating as the author keeps re-describing several prior events, sometimes four and five times each, throughout the book. At one point I thought he was writing fore someone with a little dementia, who just couldn't remember past story details. Then I began thinking it was written for me because the author thought I had a case of CRS. There's got to be at least a chapter's worth of rehash on top of rehash in this book. I began skimming every time the author started another rendition of a previous point in the story. I don't recall him doing this in books one through four and I hope he doesn't do it again in book six. Otherwise, I'm moving on." for item "Dark Matter: Star Carrier: Book Five" (with categories "Digital_Ebook_Purchase"),

which is similar to  review text: "This book grabbed me from the beginning and kept on grabbing me throughout. The author made a lot of little inside jokes that I in my long book reading life picked up on and they made me laugh each time. When the evil victim was finally murdered three quarters through the story it was a relief because well, it was pretty obvious that she was going to get it because she was destroying a whole town. However, that did not detract from the story in the slightest. I adored the main character of Nina Bannister and all of the other extremely eccentric characters in the story. I am hoping for another book in this series, if it is going to be a series. An extremely interesting story." for item "Sea Change (The Nina Bannister Mysteries Book 1)" (with categories "Digital_Ebook_Purchase"),

which is the review of  "Sea Change (The Nina Bannister Mysteries Book 1)" (with categories "Digital_Ebook_Purchase")

which is similar to  review text: "My fine hair is thinning (age!!) and this brush provides just the "lift" and wave my hair needs to add volume and somewhat disguise the thinning. Sometimes I do have to be careful with it tangling in the hair, even when I use the release button, but with care it can be untangled without damaging hair. It has just about totally replaced my hair dryer. (I usually let my hair air-dry for 15-20 minutes before using the brush, if I have the time. That cuts down on the amount of heat I have to use on my hair.)" for item "Vidal Sasson VS433C Tangle-Free Hot Air Brush Styler and Dryer" (with categories "Beauty"),

Explanation_9:
You  wrote review  review text: "I'm glad I bought this litter box. It is so simple and I can say that it's kind of \\"fun\\" cleaning the litter box now, and my cats are happier because it gets cleaned everyday now. It works great and is perfect for my two cats. I have a giant cat and he is able to fit in the box fine without making a huge mess." for item "Roll n Clean Self Cleaning Litter Box" (with categories "Pet Products"),

which is similar to  review text: "I have to say this is one of the best products we have ever bought for our cats. They love the fact that every time they get in the litter it's clean, and with everyone in household being out at least 12 hours a day week days, it save us coming home to the horrible job of scooping poop. Do I think the replacement recepticles are over priced, yes, but are they worth the investment, also yes. We love our cats, and now we love them more because we are not dreading coming home to a full cat litter tray. This product is also highly useful for those people that have neighbours come and look after there cats while you are away. Our Neighbour loved the fact that she didn't have scoop out the cat poop! While I think this can be a little pricey, it is well worth the investment." for item "LitterMaid LM900 Mega Self-Cleaning Litter Box" (with categories "Pet Products"),

which is the review of  "LitterMaid LM900 Mega Self-Cleaning Litter Box" (with categories "Pet Products")

Explanation_12:
You  wrote review  review text: "The events in this book were good. But this book was a bit aggravating as the author keeps re-describing several prior events, sometimes four and five times each, throughout the book. At one point I thought he was writing fore someone with a little dementia, who just couldn't remember past story details. Then I began thinking it was written for me because the author thought I had a case of CRS. There's got to be at least a chapter's worth of rehash on top of rehash in this book. I began skimming every time the author started another rendition of a previous point in the story. I don't recall him doing this in books one through four and I hope he doesn't do it again in book six. Otherwise, I'm moving on." for item "Dark Matter: Star Carrier: Book Five" (with categories "Digital_Ebook_Purchase"),

which is similar to  review text: "This book grabbed me from the beginning and kept on grabbing me throughout. The author made a lot of little inside jokes that I in my long book reading life picked up on and they made me laugh each time. When the evil victim was finally murdered three quarters through the story it was a relief because well, it was pretty obvious that she was going to get it because she was destroying a whole town. However, that did not detract from the story in the slightest. I adored the main character of Nina Bannister and all of the other extremely eccentric characters in the story. I am hoping for another book in this series, if it is going to be a series. An extremely interesting story." for item "Sea Change (The Nina Bannister Mysteries Book 1)" (with categories "Digital_Ebook_Purchase"),

which is the review of  "Sea Change (The Nina Bannister Mysteries Book 1)" (with categories "Digital_Ebook_Purchase")
